    <h1 slot="title">MINI</h1>
    <img src="http://platform.cstatic-images.com/in/v2/research_hero/make/mini-countryman-cooper-2021-1920-400.jpg" class="make-hero" alt="" fetchpriority="high">
    <div class="make-intro">
      <div class="make-intro-content">
        <div class="make-intro-text">
          <p>Mini is an iconic British brand whose history in the U.S. market started in the 1960s with the importation of tiny cars manufactured by British Motor Corp. After a hiatus, the brand was purchased and modernized by BMW, and reappeared in 2002 with the Cooper hatchback.</p>
<p>Since then, Mini’s lineup has expanded to satisfy buyers who desire more space and/or higher performance. The brand now sells a four-door version of the Cooper — now known as the Hardtop — as well as the Countryman subcompact SUV. Mini models offer regular and sporty S trim levels, along with high-performance John Cooper Works versions.</p>
<p>Mini was an early experimenter with battery-electric drivetrains, having fielded hundreds of modified Mini E Coopers in test fleets. The redesigned-for-2025 Hardtop and Countryman are both slated to offer all-electric powertrains in addition to gasoline engines.</p>

        </div>
        <div class="make-intro-actions">
          <spark-button variant="secondary" size="medium" href="/shopping/new/mini/" trc trid="afedfa90-9d56-4f3e-af80-ee02919a8eb8">
            Shop new
            <spark-svg name="arrow-right" slot="suffix"></spark-svg>
          </spark-button>
          <spark-button variant="text" href="/shopping/mini/" trc trid="256d0cd7-a38f-445a-8119-b67b047d201f" size="large">
            Shop used
            <spark-svg name="arrow-right" slot="suffix"></spark-svg>
          </spark-button>
        </div>
      </div>
